abstract: Reuters BreakingViews column notes Avon chief executive Andrea Jung is under pressure after poor third-quarter report and disclosure of federal inquiry; notes recent failure of PMI Group's mortgage insurance business is reminder that swaths of housing's private sector need fixing.
snippet: Andrea Jung, the chief executive of Avon, is under pressure after a dreadful third-quarter report and the disclosure of a federal inquiry.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)

lead_paragraph: Andrea Jung, the chief executive of Avon, is under pressure after a dreadful third-quarter report and the disclosure of a federal inquiry.

headline.main: Calling for Avon to Make a Change
headline.seo: Calling for Avon to Make a Change
headline.print_headline: Calling for Avon to Make a Change
